body:
So ive been with avicus for a bit close to 1 year prob and the kits are getting a bit to Regular Im Lv 19 walls but... Wait The kit Right!
-stick Fire aspect 1 knockback 2 sharpness 1
-Leather Cap 
-Level 30
-Leather boots Protection 1
Hmm A good Kit I'd Like it!... Hope it get added... Btw im sceptile not treeko Damnit!
